mapper.select: SELECT MAIL_SEQ, TO_MAIL, TITLE, CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(SEND_TIME, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_TIME FROM MAIL_INFO ORDER BY SEND_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MAIL_INFO (MAIL_SEQ, TO_MAIL, TITLE, CONTENTS, SEND_TIME) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(MAIL_SEQ),0)+1 FROM MAIL_INFO), #{toMail}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE )
